AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: Defendant who allegedly transported aliens with Williams, identified by De La Cruz and Hernandez-Gomez as the person motioning for them to hide, argued against the conspiracy conviction and had his transportation convictions affirmed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: Unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: Unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
